1.content:
Fat Vornography was just a concept at first. Something that appeared on Writing.com.

Then somehow, a video showed up.

It starred Maggie the Cat, a character from the cartoon Gargoyles, fattened up to immensity after somehow being altered by Sevarius and forced to eat her lover and the other mutates. It was fairly popular, especially amongst those who liked furries, vore, weight-gain, or all of the above.

More videos came out, eventually replaced by DVDs. Soon after, a new character was added after a website for the series was made. White Tiger, a character from Marvel Comics and the second of four to bear the name, apparently read Maggie's story, saw how lonely she was and how depressed she was because of the lack of control over her ravenous appetite, and agreed to become her total slave, giving Maggie total control of her life and giving up all her free will and rights. In short: Tiger fell in love with Maggie and willingly made herself into Maggie's property. The two made a lot of films with that theme, Maggie falling in love with her devoted slave and apparently making Tiger her official property, according to a copy of a legal document on the website. DVDs involving the two fat lovers sold out quickly.

Eventually, Fat Vornography DVDs featuring Felicia, of Darkstalkers fame appeared. Soon after, more comics characters got involved, Emma Frost, and the four Generation X girls, Jubilee, M, Husk, and Hollow. More and more, supposedly fictional characters from popular media, both male and female, became involved in Fat Vornography films. They became tremendously popular, although no one knew why the various companies would agree to let their characters be used like that.

No one save the people at the Fat Vornography studio know the truth.

Maggie and Tiger were just the first, characters from alternate worlds where fatness and eating people whole were savored. The heads of the studio seek out realities based on popular media from this world and bring them over, making videos for people's enjoyment and making a mint...

This is a story involving the stars of Fat Vornography...

*Maybe not as much of a threat as I thought he'd be...* she thought, *But still, I'd best be careful and stick to long range attacks...*

Reluctantly, she came out of the shadows, her fists glowing with etherial green energy. Jasmine and Rajah smirked at her, not frightened in the slightest.

"How did you know I was there?" she said.

Jasmine chuckled. "I am the favored priestess of the gluttonous goddess of evil, Mirage. She warned me of your coming weeks ago, Shego of America. Also, one of my guards spotted you coming in."

Shego cursed her carelessness and frowned. "So you know who I am. Do you know why I am here?"

Jasmine nodded. "To kill me. Although I'm afraid I can't allow that. That would be... inconvenient."

It was Shego's turn to smirk. "And what makes you think you can stop me?" she said, raising one of her glowing fists.

She never noticed the club-weilding guard behind her, not until it was too late and he had knocked her out.

Jasmine smirked, and said "Guards that will do anything to please me and stay out of my belly."

"You can't beat me, dearie," she said, "My goddess has commanded me to make a sacrifice out of you. I will devour you in her name, and add your strength to my own. But first... Heheh... It's been so long since Rajah has had a woman other than me..."

"I wasn't giving you a choice, deary. Fazan?"

A guard standing by Shego struck her in the back of the legs, forcing her to her knees. Another guard grabbed her and held her down as Rajah stepped up onto a platform set up for him by another guard. She winced as she felt the tiger's fat belly resting on her back

Jasmine grinned. “Little fool. Your government means nothing to me. You’ll all be sacrifices in either my belly or my goddess’s belly. You are merely my first meal. But I think you should be a little plumper, first…”

121.content:
The two talked for a bit until Shego eventually passed out and was digested. She reappeared in her dressing room feeling refreshed like she just took a nap. She stretched her arms and legs and looked at herself in the mirror. She wasn't fat anymore and back to her skinny self, a little sad she couldn't keep any of it but as part of the Regen Contract all prey that reformed had to go back to their original form before the shoot. Shego got her stuff and left the dressing room to find Rajah and Jasmine waiting outside, with Jasmine in more comfortable clothes.

"Hey thanks for waiting for me. You know you could have just left without me and I would have gone to your house." Shego told her.

"I know but Rajah didn't want to leave without you." Jasmine explained. The large tiger nuzzled Shego's leg affectionately, having bonded with her during the film shootings. "Besides, the last time I did that you broke into my house instead of using the front door."

"Old habits die hard. If you're still upset that I walked in on you changing I don't get the big deal. We see each other naked all the time."

Jasmine rolled her eyes and reminded Shego, "C'mon the limo's waiting."

"Alright, but couldn't you have kept that sexy item you had on set on?"

The two laughed and headed to the limo followed by Rajah. When they arrived at Jasmine's home, the design a lot like her palace, they ate dinner and had some wine while talking about upcoming film roles. Rajah was sitting on the couch with Jasmine after he had devoured one of the cleaning ladies.

"So Jasmine, somethings been bugging me for a while. How come you only go for roles where you're in some harem or a sultan. It's kinda.....cliche." Shego wondered.

"I know but they remind me of home and I get to wear all kinds of skimpy outfits." She answered.

"We're in vornos, all of our outfits are skimpy and since you're so fat everything you wear is skimpy."

Jasmine giggled and drank from her glass. "I haven't heard any complaints. Besides, in either roles I'm either surrounded by sexy girls or in complete control."

"Ah. I wish I could be a part of that. In all my movies I've always been a side character, not the star of it."

"You'll get your chance soon Shego."

"Yeah right, they are infinite amount of dimensions. Who knows how long it'll take for them to find one where Kim vores people or is willing to be vored."

"Just give it some time. Besides, at least for the moment we get to work together." Jasmine said in a sultry voice.

Shego finished her glass of wine and leered at the princess. "That is one thing I do enjoy. You and the fur ball over there are the best coworkers a girl could ask for."

"Well in that case I was hoping you'd like to....rehearse in the bedroom." She said teasingly.

Shego smirked and got out of her chair. "Alright, but I'm on top this time."

The two giggled and headed to the bedroom with Rajah following behind them eagerly.

1212.content:
The next morning, Shego and Jasmine were cuddled together in bed with Rajah sleeping on the floor with a contempt grin on his face. The bedsheets were coated with various cum stains. The trio were exhausted from last night like they usually were. On set, they had to show restraint otherwise they'd get off script. In bed, they were wild. Jasmine and Shego's relationship was...confusing at best. The only way to describe them for the moment was friends with benefits. They were best friends who were attracted to each other but since they were in the vorno business it was hard to tell if it was actual love or just physical attraction. Neither of them were sure so for now they remained friends and if one of them was in the mood the other would gladly pleasure them.

Shego was the first to wake up, her hair a mess and a strap on still attached to her midsection. She took it off and looked at the clock, which read 8:00 am. They weren't needed on set until 10 so she thought about making breakfast. As she got out of bed, Jasmine stirred awake and smiled. "Leaving so soon?" She teased.

Shego smirked and said, "I'm making breakfast. You want me to actually make something or find some prey?"

Jasmine yawned and burped a little, "How about some actual food. I'm not ready to swallow someone yet."

Shego nodded and headed to the kitchen. While she wasn't the best cook she knew what the princess liked. As she started cooking, her cell phone buzzed and she answered.

"Y'ello." Shego said. It was Manny and he was calling to tell her that...

info.brief_description: A counterpart to Fat Vornography, this time with a fanfic-style twist...
info.description:
Okay. The theme of this story is, essentially, that you are playing a character in a pornography studio where weight gain and vore are the primary themes of the videos/DVDs. You can choose to focus on any character, but keep within the general theme of the story. Remember, this is a mega-crossover. Moderately OOC behavior is allowed, but nothing too extreme.

Scat/Watersports is not allowed. Everyone takes special digestives that makes that unnecessary, all right?

Sex is allowed, be it hetero, homo, or whatever. It's a porn studio, so sex is pretty much a given. Beastiality is allowed.

Pregnancy is allowed, as is romance. Some semblance of plot is allowed as well.

The youngest characters I'll allow having sex is 16. Any younger and I'll delete the chapter. If you want to have a character that is normally younger than 16 in, have them aged up to 16. Alright?

Keep choice chapters to a minimum, please.

But most of all, I want you to have fun.
